title: Gladiator's Arena Tunnels Adventure #21
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Gladiator's Cell
rooms.description: A cramped stone cell deep beneath the arena. The walls are covered with scratched tallies marking countless days of captivity. Rusted chains hang from iron rings bolted to the walls. Through a small barred window high above, you can hear the distant roar of the crowd. The air is damp and smells of sweat and blood. A heavy wooden door is the only exit.

items.name: stone sleeping bench
items.description: A crude stone bench where gladiators rest between battles

items.name: iron chisel
items.description: A small chisel hidden beneath the bench, used to carve messages into stone

items.name: wall carvings
items.description: Messages and symbols scratched into the stone walls by previous prisoners
items.text: Among the tallies and prayers, one message stands out: 'The Colosseum was completed in the year 80 AD. Emperor Titus opened it with 100 days of games. Remember this - it is the key to freedom. - Maximus'

items.name: supply crate
items.description: A wooden crate containing basic supplies and personal belongings

items.name: gladiator's journal
items.description: A worn scroll containing the writings of a former gladiator
items.text: Day 47: I have fought in the arena for three years. Arena Master Marcus Flavius controls everything - our training, our fights, our lives. They say the great champion Maximus once escaped through the beast tunnels. The combination to my hidden compartment is the year this cursed arena was built.

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A bronze key with the imperial eagle engraved on it

items.name: rusted chains
items.description: Heavy chains that once bound prisoners

items.name: wooden chest
items.description: A sturdy chest bound with iron bands and a bronze lock

items.name: gladiator access token
items.description: A bronze token that grants access to restricted areas of the tunnels

items.name: official arena notice
items.description: A notice posted by the arena administration
items.text: NOTICE: All gladiators must report to the Armory for weapon assignment before combat. Arena Master Marcus Flavius oversees all operations. Champions are housed in special quarters. The beast tunnels are strictly forbidden to all personnel.

items.name: heavy cell door
items.description: A thick wooden door reinforced with iron bands. A slot for an access token is built into the lock mechanism.

rooms.name: Armory Tunnel
rooms.description: A long stone corridor lined with weapon racks and armor stands. Torches flicker in wall sconces, casting dancing shadows. The walls are decorated with faded murals depicting famous gladiatorial battles. Training dummies stand in alcoves, scarred from countless practice strikes. A massive iron door at the far end leads to the Arena Master's private chambers.

items.name: weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding various gladiatorial weapons - swords, tridents, and nets

items.name: gladius sword
items.description: A short Roman sword, standard weapon of the gladiator

items.name: armor stand
items.description: A wooden stand displaying a gladiator's protective gear

items.name: bronze helmet
items.description: A gladiator's helmet with a distinctive crest

items.name: battle mural
items.description: A large mural depicting a legendary gladiatorial combat
items.text: The mural shows the great champion Maximus defeating three opponents in a single day. An inscription reads: 'Maximus, Champion of Champions, victor of 50 battles. His legend lives eternal. He alone knew the secret path through the beast tunnels to freedom.'

items.name: practice training dummy
items.description: A wooden dummy used for combat training, heavily scarred

items.name: training schedule
items.description: A parchment listing training times and assignments
items.text: TRAINING SCHEDULE: All gladiators report to Arena Master Marcus Flavius at dawn. Champions receive special training. Remember: discipline, strength, and honor. The beast tunnels are maintained by the beast master and are off-limits to gladiators.

items.name: supply cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with compartments for storing equipment and supplies

items.name: oil lamp
items.description: A small lamp for lighting dark tunnels

items.name: tunnel map
items.description: A hand-drawn map of the underground tunnels
items.text: TUNNEL MAP: The beast tunnels run beneath the arena floor, connecting to the outside. Only the Arena Master has official access. Legend says Maximus used these tunnels to escape. The path leads to freedom for those brave enough to take it.

items.name: champions plaque
items.description: A bronze plaque listing the arena's greatest champions
items.text: HALL OF CHAMPIONS: Maximus - 50 victories, Spartacus - 42 victories, Priscus - 38 victories, Verus - 35 victories. These warriors brought glory to the arena and honor to Rome.

items.name: iron door to master's chamber
items.description: A massive iron door with three security questions engraved on a bronze plate. This door leads to the Arena Master's private chambers.

password_questions.question: Who controls the arena?
password_questions.hint: Check the arena notice and training schedule for the Arena Master's name

password_questions.question: What is the path to freedom?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts mention how to escape the arena

password_questions.question: Who was the greatest champion?
password_questions.hint: The wall carvings, mural, and champions plaque all mention this legendary gladiator

rooms.name: Arena Master's Chamber
rooms.description: You've reached the Arena Master's private chamber! A luxurious room in stark contrast to the cells below. Rich tapestries hang on the walls, and a large desk holds scrolls and documents. Through an open archway, you can see the beast tunnels - dark passages that lead beneath the arena floor to the outside world. The sound of freedom echoes from beyond. Fresh air flows through the tunnel entrance.

items.name: Arena Master's desk
items.description: An ornate desk covered with administrative documents and arena records

items.name: decorative tapestries
items.description: Expensive tapestries depicting Roman military victories

items.name: beast tunnel entrance
items.description: A dark stone archway leading into the beast tunnels - the path to freedom
items.text: The tunnel stretches into darkness, but you can see daylight far in the distance. This is the legendary escape route used by Maximus. Freedom awaits!

items.name: scroll of liberation
items.description: A scroll left on the desk, as if waiting for you
items.text: To whoever reads this: You have proven yourself worthy by solving the puzzles of the arena. The beast tunnels will lead you to freedom. Go now, and may the gods favor your journey. - A Friend

rooms.win_message: You have escaped the Gladiator's Arena! Following the beast tunnels through the darkness, you emerge into the bright Roman sunlight outside the Colosseum. The roar of the crowd fades behind you as you run toward freedom. Like the legendary Maximus before you, you have solved the puzzles and escaped captivity. You are free! You win!
